info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 4:24PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Chouteau and northeastern Cascade Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 424 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Black Eagle, or over Great Falls, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Great Falls, Black Eagle, and Malmstrom Afb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
